name: Ext_R5_NamingSystem_identifier
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.NamingSystem.identifier for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents NamingSystem.identifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NamingSystem|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Additional identifier for the naming system (business identifier)
element.definition: A formal identifier that is used to identify this naming system when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.
element.comment: `NamingSystem.identifier` has no related element in R4B:NamingSystem

element.short: Additional identifier for the naming system (business identifier)
element.definition: A formal identifier that is used to identify this naming system when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.
element.comment: `NamingSystem.identifier` has no related element in R4B:NamingSystem
